title: Lesson 95
paragraph: This lesson focuses on simplicity and purity, emphasizing minimalist, austere, and genuine qualities.

words.meaning: characterized by simplicity and the use of few elements
words.example: The apartment has a minimalist design.

words.meaning: severe or strict in manner; having no comforts or luxuries
words.example: The monk lived an austere life.

words.meaning: free from unnecessary elements; simple and pure
words.example: The design of the website is clean and intuitive.
She wore a plain dress to the meeting.

words.meaning: easily understood or done; not complex
words.example: He chose a simple solution to the problem.

words.meaning: existing in or derived from nature; not artificial
words.example: The ingredients are natural and organic.

words.meaning: truly what something is said to be; authentic
words.example: He showed genuine interest in her story.

words.meaning: free of deceit; truthful and sincere
words.example: She gave an honest account of the events.
